entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
